Lilian Gertrude Woolf, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Lilian Wolfe (22  Disemba 1875 na London n'ụbọchị 28 Eprel 1974 na Cheltenham), bụ onye England anarchist, pacifist na feminist. Ọ bụ onye otu Freedom Press maka ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya.
A mụrụ Wolfe na ụlọ ahịa ọla nna ya na Edgware Road, London n'ụbọchị 22 Disemba 1875

Nne ya, Lucy Helen Jones, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Birmingham onye Wolfe ga-akọwa dị ka "nwanyi nwere nkụda mmụọ" nke hapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ mgbe Wolfe dị afọ iri na atọ iji soro ụlọ ọrụ na-eme egwuregwu mee njem n'ụwa, ebe nna ya, Albert Lewis Woolf bụ onye na'ere ọla na Liverpudlian nke sitere na ndị Juu na nke nwere echiche na-agbaso omenala. O nwere ụmụnne nwoke atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, ma nwee ọzụzụ dị mma na nke orthodox, nke ndị na-elekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mbụ ma mesịa bụrụ obere oge na Regent Street Polytechnic.
